languages.text: "Поверьте, далеко не единственный". {n}Скупая, но от того не менее двусмысленная улыбка возникает на губах арбитра.{/n}
"It is far from the only one, trust me." {n}A thin smile, but no less suggestive for that, appears on Solomorne's lips.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Поверьте, далеко не единственный". {n}Скупая, но от того не менее двусмысленная улыбка возникает на губах арбитра.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It is far from the only one, trust me." {n}A thin smile, but no less suggestive for that, appears on Solomorne's lips.{/n}

"It is far from the only one, trust me." {n}A thin smile, but no less suggestive for that, appears on Solomorne's lips.{/n}

languages.text: 「それだけではありません。信じてください」{n}ソロモーンの唇にかすかな笑みが浮かんだが、意味深な雰囲気は少しも薄れていなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is far from the only one, trust me." {n}A thin smile, but no less suggestive for that, appears on Solomorne's lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それだけではありません。信じてください」{n}ソロモーンの唇にかすかな笑みが浮かんだが、意味深な雰囲気は少しも薄れていなかった。{/n}

languages.text: "Es ist bei Weitem nicht das einzige, glaubt mir." {n}Ein schmales, aber dennoch vielsagendes Lächeln erscheint auf Solomornes Lippen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is far from the only one, trust me." {n}A thin smile, but no less suggestive for that, appears on Solomorne's lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es ist bei Weitem nicht das einzige, glaubt mir." {n}Ein schmales, aber dennoch vielsagendes Lächeln erscheint auf Solomornes Lippen.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est loin d'être le seul, croyez-moi. » {n}Un sourire timide, mais non moins suggestif pour autant, apparaît sur les lèvres de Solomorne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is far from the only one, trust me." {n}A thin smile, but no less suggestive for that, appears on Solomorne's lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est loin d'être le seul, croyez-moi. » {n}Un sourire timide, mais non moins suggestif pour autant, apparaît sur les lèvres de Solomorne.{/n}

languages.text: «Créame, no es ni por asomo el único». {n}Una tenue sonrisa, aunque no por ello menos sugerente, asoma a los labios de Solomorne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is far from the only one, trust me." {n}A thin smile, but no less suggestive for that, appears on Solomorne's lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Créame, no es ni por asomo el único». {n}Una tenue sonrisa, aunque no por ello menos sugerente, asoma a los labios de Solomorne.{/n}

languages.text: “我的天赋可不仅仅只有这些，相信我。”{n}索罗蒙唇角露出了淡淡的笑容，充满了暗示的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is far from the only one, trust me." {n}A thin smile, but no less suggestive for that, appears on Solomorne's lips.{/n}

languages.text: "Bundan ibaret sanmayın." {n}Solomorne'un dudaklarında ince ama manalı bir gülüş beliriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is far from the only one, trust me." {n}A thin smile, but no less suggestive for that, appears on Solomorne's lips.{/n}
